title: Generative AI-Enabled Mathematics Instruction Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening generative AI pedagogical competencies through actual lesson design experiences

learning_goals: Learners can perform iterative prompt refinement processes at least three times when designing math lessons using generative AI
Learners can critically evaluate and revise AI-generated materials according to TPACK standards
Learners can propose collaborative lesson designs applying the Human-AI Shared Regulatory Learning (HASRL) framework

resources: TPACK (Technological Pedagogical Content Knowledge) Assessment Rubric

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
